name: ZerinLabs
about: Full stack app where users can perform full CRUD on their medications and user account. Deployed on AWS.

name: Much TODO
about: Full stack app where users can perform full CRUD, login, sign up, and authenticated for enhanced security.

name: Recipes App
about: Front-end app that gets the information from a built JSON file. Implements hooks to see the ingredients of the recipes.

name: Quiz App
about: App that simulates a quiz and gives a result to the user. Built using hooks in React. Gets the information from a JSON file.

name: ChatGPT Therapy
about: A web app built in React and connected to ChatGPT to simulate a real human therapist.

name: Live Clock
about: A beautifully designed website created using HTML5 and CSS3 that dynamically fetches and displays the current time.

name: Jokes App
about: A React Native mobile app that utilizes the useEffect and useState hooks to fetch data from a sample API.

name: Musician Portfolio
about: A visually appealing portfolio website developed using HTML5 and CSS3 to leave a lasting impression on visitors.

name: Codice de Boca
about: A React application that efficiently retrieves and displays data from a simulated restaurant menu API.

name: Wine Catalog
about: A React application that emulates a wine catalog, fetching and presenting data from an external API

name: Counter App
about: An app that showcases the useState() hook by using a counter that increments and decrements.

name: Lunch Spot
about: A React Native mobile application that retrieves and displays data of various restaurants.
